name: UMaterialExpressionSpriteTextureSampler
doc: This is a texture sampler 2D with a special automatically defined parameter name. The texture specified here will be replaced by the SourceTexture or an AdditionalSourceTextures entry of a Paper2D sprite if this material is used on a sprite.

bSampleAdditionalTextures: Is this a sampler for the default SourceTexture or the AdditionalSourceTextures list?
AdditionalSlotIndex: This is the slot index into the AdditionalSourceTextures array
SlotDisplayName: Friendly label for the texture slot, displayed in the Sprite Editor if not empty
